code: import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{useAuth}from'../AuthContext';import PlaceholderImage from'../assets/logo.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProfileCard=_ref=>{let{id,firstName,lastName,year,bio,major,image,score}=_ref;const{savedProfiles,handleToggleSave}=useAuth();const isSaved=savedProfiles.some(profile=>profile.saved_id===id);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ProfileCard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image?image:PlaceholderImage,alt:"Northwestern Logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ProfileText",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:[firstName," ",lastName," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Match: ",score,"%"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:[major,", Class of ",year]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:bio}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"buttonRow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/profiles/".concat(id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Connect"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleToggleSave(id,isSaved),children:isSaved?"Delete from Saved":"Save"})]})]})]});};export default ProfileCard;
